title: 672 - Alice Isn't At Brunch - "Alice" Season One Realtime Recap
description:
Help plan a dreamy brunch where we map out season one of “Alice Isn’t Dead” and fold it into every dish. Savor the dough before your road trip into dreamland. (story at about 18 mins)

Alice Isn’t Dead http://www.nightvalepresents.com/aliceisntdead/
Preorder the novel http://www.nightvalepresents.com/aliceisntdead/#novel

Cover Art by Rob Wilson http://www.robwilsonwork.com/


You can find all of our sponsors or become a patron on our new website www.sleepwithmepodcast.com
